oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Future of Australian Organics in a Changing Marketplace
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Monk, Dr Andrew
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Australia
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An overview of the Australian organic industry including challenges and propects and latest figures for certified area of land, market value where known, and exact export data by volume.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Monk, Dr Andrew (2004) The Future of Australian Organics in a Changing Marketplace. Biological Farmers of Australia.
